metadata.name: The Garden Against the World by Harrison First 1/40
metadata.description: decent.xyz's 'The Garden Against the World' is a collection of 40 NFTs for Harrison First's song of the same name. Each NFT entitles its owner to 1% of the royalties earned on The Garden Against the World over the next 3 years. Additionally, by staking these NFTs through the Decent platform, users will be rewarded daily with $FIRST tokens. Learn more at decent.xyz
